titleStmt.title: The Lamentations of the prophet Jeremiah paraphras'd suitable to the exigencies of these times.

publicationStmt.date: Printed Novemb. 11, the day on which His Majestie, God bless him, retir'd from Hampton-Court. M. D. C. XLVII [1667]

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: p. [16] stained, with slight loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
